Articles.Content: I was really annoyed over the latest layout change.I logged in a few minutes ago and found the reverted it back to the previous version,The comments system is the crappy same but they actually did something right.Might this be the start of more or is it just a mistake that they reverted it.
Looks the same to me, what changes did you notice exactly?

um well...

-Guide tab was a scroll down(click to expand,move cursor to get rid of).

-When looking at playlists or channel playlists individual videos cannot be opened in new tabs.

-personal playlist scroll down gone.

-Playlists in big screen(not fullscreen)had a list of videos on the playlist under the ad under the video.

I can't remember anything else,Someone else might remember some more.
Damn, I didn't even notice until now. Hopefully this is just the beginning of several more layout reverts in the future.
I like it better now. Less glitchy.

It was like it is now before the last (crappy) change.

before revert.

Edited February 2, 2014 by Spartwo
Yeah, they make small changes sometimes, usually for this worst. This time around seemed like an improvement.
